name: Art of Fighting
overview: South Town is no place for the weak. Yet into this urban battle zone comes Ryo; braving the mean streets in order to rescue his kidnapped sister. With his friend Robert, the two must use all their strength and skills to battle and defeat the toughest fighters ever assembled. These fighters are big, powerful, strong - each possess special skills that will be hard to counter. Ryo must master the Super Attacks if he is to be victorious. Fight hard, fast and furious. Only the strongest of fighters will survive the streets of South Town.
